effect.kubejs.well_fed.description: Grants regeneration, extra armor, and combat bonuses while well fed.
effect.kubejs.golden_might.description: Restores health faster in the depths and enhances mining speed below 0
effect.kubejs.frostburner.description: Grants a chance to Chill struck enemies and a smaller chance to Freeze them briefly.
effect.kubejs.buff_galore.description: Enemies killed have a high chance to drop a Buff.
effect.kubejs.crusader_aura.description: Grants the Crusader Protection effect to nearby allies.
effect.kubejs.crusader_protection.descri: Provided by being near a crusader affected by the Crusader Aura.
effect.kubejs.sun_light.description: Casting a Holy Spell on an ally grants them additional defensive effects.
effect.kubejs.prior_faith.description: Casting a Holy Spell on an ally applies the Holy Warmth effect. If the target already has Holy Warmth, it is consumed to empower them and increase the caster’s mana regeneration.
effect.kubejs.holy_warmth.description: Can be consumed by a spellcaster with the Prior’s Faith effect.
effect.kubejs.skyjade_knowledge.descript: After spending 250 mana, gain the Skyjade's Strength effect.
